q1: Will Ronaldo continue his form from the World Cup with Juventus?
a1: I believe that he will, yes.
q2: I think he will be even better for Juventus.
q3: I also think that he will.
a3: I also think that he will do it, he should stay in shape that is an excellent elite player
q4: If I think that he will stay in shape
a5: If he is 33 years old and is one of the best in the world
